timeline.headline: 30 Technologies in 30 Days -- By Shekhar Gulati

date.headline: Day 1: Bowerâ€”Manage Your Client Side Dependencies
date.text: The first day talks about Bower and how you can use it.

date.headline: Day 2: AngularJS--Getting My Head Around AngularJS
date.text: Yesterday I kicked off a challenge where in I will learn a new technology every day for a month. In the first post of this month long series, I talked about Bower -- package manager for client side assets. You can read the blog here. You can read the reddit discussion here.

date.headline: Day 3: Flask--Instant Python Web Development with Python and OpenShift
date.text: Pactpub recently contacted me to review their recently published book on Flask, which is a popular Python framework. The book is titled Instant Flask Web Development and is written by Ron DuPlain.
